entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Component governance failing on musl legs of servicing branches #85492
  • Analyzer: Report inefficient use of sets. #85490
  • Analyzer: Introduce an analyzer to recommend optimize dictionaries with small key types #85489
  • Analyzer: Introduce an analyzer to recommend upgrading reference tuples to the more efficient value tuples #85488
  • Analyzer: Introduce an analyzer to recommend the more efficient string splitting features in .NET 8 #85487
  • [API Proposal]: Add IHostApplicationBuilder interface #85486
  • Tracking issue for enabling the Windows thread pool #85485
  • GC Performance OS and Hardware Comparison Differences: Windows Intel vs. Ubuntu Intel and Windows Intel vs. Ubuntu ARM #85483
  • Transparently serialize collections with custom JSonConverter #85479
  • Test failure: _Avx512F_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Avx512F.Program.ConvertToVector256UInt16WithSaturationVector512UInt32() #85469
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `ISpanProvider<T>`/`IReadOnlySpanProvider<T>` interface to generalize types with `.AsSpan()` method #85468
  • Scheduled tasks stop working after 2023.04.14 1:41:36 UTC #85473
  • [Wasm.Build.Tests] Could not restore Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current.Manifest #85456
    8.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS disk size regression on 24 Apr 2023 #85452
    8.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS disk size regression on 14 Apr 2023 #85451
    8.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS disk size regression on 12 Apr 2023 #85450
    8.0.0
  • [mono][perf] Master issue for iOS disk size regressions #85448
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Tests.HttpWebRequestTest_Sync.GetResponseAsync_ParametersAreCachableButDifferent_CreateNewClient #85436
  • TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById is slow on Linux when input is Windows TimeZone ID #85432
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Optimize block unrolling operations using AVX-512 #83798
    8.0.0
  • Optimize field access in types not marked with beforefieldinit #1327
    8.0.0
  • Strange permissions issue when calling dylib function from C# #85428
  • [wasi] Unescaped file paths when compiling with `WasmSingleFileBundle` #84878
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8FormatterTests #76886
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in Dictionary and Hashset on 9/24/2022 1:05:07 PM #76256
    8.0.0
  • EnvironmentVariablesConfigurationProvider not loaded variable with dash ('-') symbol #85477
  • Xamarin Android C# - use of Substring() in Array.IndexOf does not work #84084
    7.0.x
  • Assertion failed 'block->lastNode()->OperGet() == GT_RETFILT' during 'Generate code' (IL size 1480; hash 0x46e9aa75; FullOpts) #85088
    8.0.0
  • [jitstress] JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_10780 fails #85449
    8.0.0
  • Store unhandled exception info on stack in Native AOT #84636
    8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Application layer protocol negotiation error was encountered #85412
  • httpclient.PostAsJsonAsync ignores jsonpropertyname attr if it starts with an @ on serialization #84612
    8.0.0
  • CLR errors #73126
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make some System.Net.Security functions/properties public for System.Net.Quic #67552
    8.0.0
  • List.AddRange should go on interface. #85407
  • Expected to find either one or three in .../artifacts/packages/Release/Shipping/ #85394
    8.0.0
  • PNSE in System.Buffers.IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher.IndexOfAnyVectorized on iOS/tvOS arm64 #85345
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.sh #85439
  • Test failure readytorun/tests/mainv1/mainv1.sh #85442
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/SIMD/RayTracer/RayTracer/RayTracer.sh #85440
  • Update to System.Management 7.0.1 in .NET Standard 2.0 dll causes runtime binding failure in .NET Framework 4.8.1 app #85427
  • [Arm64] Peephole optimization opportunities #55365
    Future
  • ARM64: Optimize pair of "ldr reg, [fp]" to ldp #35130
    Future
  • ARM64: Optimize pair of "str reg, [reg]" to stp #35133
    Future
  • ARM64: Optimize pair of "str reg, [fp]" to stp #35134
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add better fix for UnhandledExceptionHandlerUnix #85497
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: ARR_LENGTH(new T[CNS]) --> CNS #85496
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip methods in test-merging if they use the named argument 'Skip' for the Fact attributes #85495
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move `ASG` rationalization to just after global morph #85494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix issue with hoisting and copy prop interaction #85493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Support step over and pause multiple times in same line but different columns #85484
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [wasm] GenerateWasmBootJson - close file handles #85482
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono
  • Intrinsics analyzer and fixes #85481
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Prefer lld in NativeAot when using clang #85478
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Comment out support for mtag extension in libunwind #85474
    source-build
  • Fix volatility checks in VN and loop side effects code #85467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix cast type to conform to Roslyn API #85466
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • fix JsonNode deserialising from null #85463
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Update createdumpwindows to not appear to succeed after getting ERROR_PARTIAL_COPY 5 times #85462
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] ArmBase methods are now intrinsic. #85458
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Ignore] Testing CI #85457
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Docs on testing blazor wasm #85455
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Assert on unhandled opcodes instead of falling back to t… #85454
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add request metrics to System.Net.Http #85447
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Abstract out ParameterBuilder and implement it #85446
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Mono][RISC-V] emit mul inst instead of emulated mul #85445
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement `ExperimentalAttribute` #85444
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Ignore merged test markers for tests without execution script #85441
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enable regex to use IndexOf(..., OrdinalIgnoreCase) for prefix searching #85438
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Improve vectorization of IndexOf(chars, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) #85437
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Allow reverse pinvoke in DoNotTriggerGc thread state regardless of coop mode. #85435
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo14::GetNonGCHeapBounds #85434
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • Enable AVX-512 for block unrollings (both copying and zeroing) #85389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Comment out support for mtag extension in libunwind #85431
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Add Android BenchmarkDotNet test #85282
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix _MergedWrapperMarker to not include markers without corresponding execution scripts #85476
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix createdump arg parsing for signal-based exceptions #85425
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.18
  • Fix createdump arg parsing for signal-based exceptions #85422
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] GenerateWasmBootJson - close file handles #85480
    area-Build-mono
  • Added the ability to specify a Spin Count Unit via a GC Configuration to release/7.0 #84495
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.7
  • [release/7.0-staging] [native-library] If a dllimport is specified with an absolute path, look for it first #85270
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-mono, 7.0.7
  • [wasi] Fix support for paths with spaces #85022
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [mono] Add back OP_XOP_OVR_X_X for arm64 #85409
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Handle GT_RETFILT in fgInsertStmtNearEnd #85420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce calli address spilling #85349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Re-enable PGO for linux #85410
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Propagate some more indir flags in physical promotion #85453
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Implements the emitter::emitDispIns. #85375
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] GT_JMP implementation in codegen #85416
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V][JIT] JIT/CodeGenBringUpTest #84748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Store unhandled exception info on stack in Native AOT #84871
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [browser] Fix webcil lazy loading and satellite assemblies in Wasm SDK #85400
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Use latest stable version of chrome #85114
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Delete support for IAT indirecting base type/interfaces #85376
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make some SystemNetSecurity properties public #85402
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Add back OP_XOP_OVR_X_X for arm64 #85401
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Enable other native subsets for linux-riscv64 in CI #85443
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][llvm] Enable the cold calling conv on osx/linux. #83519
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [Arm64] Replace pairs of `str` with `stp` #85032
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: prefer edge counts; keep class profiles even if tossing counts #85406
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add arm64 wasm support #83677
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution

Updated

  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - use the new sdk with templates #85498
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84806
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • Fix XUnit Log Fixer Irregularities #85183
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • Fix Diagnostic port suspension message doesn't report expected port name #85430
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    api-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Enabling RuntimeEventSource in NativeAOT #85424
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add new SafeHandleMarshaller type to provide out-of-generator marshalling support. #85419
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Stress hack for msquic dropping connections #84793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Invoke AssemblyLoad hooks from RuntimeAssemblyBuilder:.ctor ()… #85307
    NO-MERGE, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Support encoding `TypedReference`s in signatures. #85360
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
